info.author: Greg Ward
info.description:
Optik is a powerful, flexible, extensible, easy-to-use
command-line parsing library for Python.  Using Optik, you
can add intelligent, sophisticated handling of command-line
options to your scripts with very little overhead.
info.name: optik
info.summary: Powerful, flexible, easy-to-use, command-line parsing library
info.html_description: Optik is a powerful, flexible, extensible, easy-to-use command-line parsing library for Python. Using Optik, you can add intelligent, sophisticated handling of command-line options to your scripts with very little overhead.
